Total number of bytes received from this replica over the network for the AG.
The number of database message bytes enqueued to be send over the network to this replica. The bytes include messages for all databases in the AG.
The total number of bytes send over the network to the replica.
Number of flow controls enabled for this replica per second.
The number of milliseconds flow control was enabled for this replica within the last second.
Total number of messages received from this replica for the AG.
The rate per second to get acknowledgements for messages sent to the replica.
Number of messages enqueued to be send over the network to this replica.
Number of messages sent over the network to this replica. This account for all the messages sent from this replica including control messages.
Amount of FILESTREAM data received by the secondary replica for the secondary database in the last second.
Number of log blocks pending to be applied to the database replica.
Number of log blocks pending and ready to be applied to the database replica.
The number of log bytes received by this replica. This is valid only on the secondary replica.
The amount of logs that need to be undone (in kilobytes).
The size of the log send queue on this replica.
The number of transactions processed through synchronization commits. Dividing transaction delay by mirrored transactions to get delay per transaction.
Amount of log records in the log files of the secondary replica that has not yet been redone.
Number of times the REDO thread was blocked in this database since this database was brought ONLINE.
The amount of log bytes remaining to be redone to finish the reverting phase.
The rate at which log records are redone on the secondary replica.
Total kilobytes of logs that must be undone.
The total time for all transactions waited on the secondary acknowledgement.
